mains.description: Traditional turkey smoked over Georgia pecan wood, bringing a rich, nutty flavor to the holiday classic.
Tender ham glazed with Georgia peaches and honey, offering a sweet and savory Southern twist.

sides.description: Classic cornbread stuffing with roasted Georgia pecans, celery, and herbs, bringing a taste of the South to the table.

sides.item: Sweet Potato Casserole with Pecan Streusel
sides.description: Creamy sweet potatoes topped with a crunchy pecan streusel, baked to perfection with a hint of cinnamon.
Tender, slow-cooked collard greens seasoned with smoked bacon and a touch of vinegar for a savory side.
Flaky buttermilk biscuits served with honey butter, perfect for sopping up Thanksgiving flavors.

desserts.item: Peach Cobbler with Vanilla Ice Cream
desserts.description: Warm Georgia peach cobbler served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream, bringing a comforting end to the meal.
